creditline: Gift of Mr. Harry E. Wood
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Spoon with yellowish horn (Big Horn Sheep) bowl and black horn (Rocky Mountain Goat) handle spliced on and fastened with brass ? rivets. The handle is blunt-pointed and has two 'eye' designs on the sides.
medium: Bighorn sheep and Rocky Mountain goat horn and brass
title: Spoon
